definition: to lead along/to pull (an animal on a tether)/(bound form) to involve/to draw in

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters

sentences.english: Tri-density rubber traction outsole is slip and oil resistant.
sentences.chinese: 三密度的橡胶牵引力大底防滑和耐油。

sentences.english: The increase of lug height may result in the improvement of drawbar pull and driving efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 增加齿高可以提高牵引力和驱动效率。

sentences.english: This paper gives a new way to realize a mere draught force sensing on the top-link-sensing systems.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种新的实现力调节系统纯牵引力传感的方法。

sentences.english: Floral-patterned rubber outsole provides lightweight durability and traction.
sentences.chinese: 花卉图案的橡胶外底提供轻便耐用性和牵引力。

sentences.english: It comes with extra-deep and wide pattern to reduce sliding, enhance stability and increase traction force.
sentences.chinese: 其超深宽花纹可减少滑动，增加稳定性和牵引力。

sentences.english: It pivots high in the aluminum frame to maximize rear wheel traction.
sentences.chinese: 它在铝支点架高，以最大限度地提高后轮的牵引力。

sentences.english: But the basketball shoes gained more traction.
sentences.chinese: 篮球鞋，但获得更多的牵引力。

sentences.english: We need to improve the driveability side of the engine and also the mechanical traction of the car.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要改进引擎的操控性能和赛车的机械牵引力。

sentences.english: In FWD and AWD available traction at the front is divided between steering and driving.
sentences.chinese: 全驱和前驱车的牵引力则被用在转向和驾驶。

sentences.english: Roughening helps alleviate this problem and ensures better traction.
sentences.chinese: 粗糙有助于缓解这一问题，并确保更好的牵引力。

sentences.english: Four-wheel drive, strong pull, well-done in climbing slope, high efficiency and saving oil.
sentences.chinese: 全轮驱动，牵引力大，爬坡能力强，高效节能。

sentences.english: Ashtanga yoga mats have good traction and durability.
sentences.chinese: 阿斯汤加瑜伽垫具有良好的牵引力和耐用性。

sentences.english: Non-marking, dual-density rubber outsole provides traction and durability.
sentences.chinese: 不脱色，双密度橡胶外底提供的牵引力和耐用性。

sentences.english: Durable leather outsole for traction and durability.
sentences.chinese: 耐用的皮革外底牵引力和耐用性。

sentences.english: Hydraulic differential lock for improved rough terrain capability.
sentences.chinese: 液压差速锁提高崎岖地形牵引力。

sentences.english: One of the biggest problems will be maintaining traction on the salt flats.
sentences.chinese: 挑战中最大的问题之一是在盐碱滩上保持牵引力。

definition: pulling force/(fig.) allure/(materials testing) tensile strength/(loanword) rally
